TEXT: CARDINAL . The case was referred to the ORG by ORG ( " the Commission " ) on DATE . It originated in an application ( no . CARDINAL ) against GPE lodged with the Commission by an NORP national , Mr PERSON , on DATE .

CARDINAL . For the facts of the case , reference should be made to paragraphs CARDINAL - CARDINAL of the judgment delivered on DATE ( Series A no . CARDINAL-C , p. CARDINAL ) . In that judgment the ORG found a violation of LAW para . CARDINAL ( article CARDINAL ) of the LAW because civil proceedings brought on DATE , though not complex , remained pending ( ibid . , pp . CARDINAL - CARDINAL , paras . CARDINAL of the judgment , and point CARDINAL of the operative provisions ) . The ORG did not deem it necessary to consider also the complaint based on LAW No . CARDINAL ( PCARDINAL - CARDINAL ) ( ibid . , p. CARDINAL , paras . CARDINAL of the judgment , and point CARDINAL of the operative provisions ) .

CARDINAL . Mr NORP did not make any pecuniary claim in respect of the violation of LAW para . CARDINAL ( article CARDINAL ) , nor did he seek reimbursement of the costs and fees incurred in the proceedings before the ORG and the ORG . He did , on the other hand , seek compensation in the amount of MONEY for pecuniary damage sustained as a result of the alleged breach of LAW No . CARDINAL ( PCARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .

The ORG dismissed this claim as matters stood , as it was still possible that the national courts would make reparation for the financial consequences of failing to try the case within a reasonable time ( ibid . , pp . CARDINAL - CARDINAL , paras . CARDINAL - CARDINAL of the judgment and point CARDINAL of the operative provisions ) .

CARDINAL . In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE , which was filed in its registry on DATE and became final on DATE , ORG found against PERSON and awarded the respondent , Mr NORP , compensation in the amount of MONEY , representing the value of a parcel of land that had been unlawfully occupied by PERSON
The applicant informed ORG registry of this decision on CARDINAL DATE and supplied the text on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , as authorised by the President , Mr Zanghì filed his claim for just satisfaction .
On DATE observations were received from the Government and the ORG respectively ; the applicant replied to them on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG re - entered the case in its list and decided not to hold a hearing .

CARDINAL . As PERSON was unable to attend the deliberations on DATE , his place as President of the ORG was taken by PERSON ( Rule CARDINAL para . CARDINAL , second sub - paragraph ) ; Sir PERSON , substitute judge , replaced Mr Ryssdal as a member of ORG CARDINAL para . CARDINAL and CARDINAL para . CARDINAL ) .
